author: phi_curious
body: Ishan is an absolute legend :)  can I ask you, what stands out to you about Kendu? Apart from the crazy community strength?  And what is something you would like seeing us improving?

author: phi_curious
body: Hi L3nni8, thanks for the proactive post. I like that you open the conversation.   Also wanna give a shout out to u/CoopVelociraptor who brought this up in the TG and who will have good input.  Sorry for the unstructured post. These are just my random thoughts:  From my point of view we need to add more content that is not just a random "smash this" or "smash that", we need content that is funny, that opens a conversation, content that is different and thoughtful.  If we make content that is fun and engaging people naturally come back, because they want to hang out here, and that will also increase our "smash" effort.   I have been thinking on how I can contribute, maybe people can give some input on these:  1. post more memes [https://www.reddit.com/r/KenduInu\_Ecosystem/comments/1jw2rp7/happy\_thursday\_chads\_chadettes](https://www.reddit.com/r/KenduInu_Ecosystem/comments/1jw2rp7/happy_thursday_chads_chadettes)  2. write articles that are thought provoking [https://www.reddit.com/r/KenduInu\_Ecosystem/comments/1jvy5zk/did\_you\_read\_the\_snack\_machine\_post](https://www.reddit.com/r/KenduInu_Ecosystem/comments/1jvy5zk/did_you_read_the_snack_machine_post)  3. make a GM post that sets the mood for the day, e.g. a fortune cookie wisdom of the day, or a window of the day. I like the 24h recaps because they are important to create a tight bond between community members, and I think that a similar format that is focused on how to move forward could be interesting. I am not sure yet though what that would exactly be.  In the end though, whatever kind of content each individual creates, it has to be fun to the creator. It should never feel like a task that you have to do, but rather something that you enjoy.

Maybe just to tidy things up we could pin a ‚ÄúDaily Raid Post‚Äù where everyone throws that stuff in there. Might actually even make it easier for folks to find and respond to all of them haha.

author: phi_curious
body: That is understandable, we only got that many hours in a day, so reading everything becomes challenging.  Let me ask you this. when you say you wanna stay in touch, do you mean you want to know what is going on in the community, e.g. what was talked about, maybe some personal stories that were shared, some bullish news.  Or do you mean you want to see links to posts on social media that you can add comments to?  Just trying to understand what people would like to see. Thank you.

author: TheGDC33
body: Here are my thoughts...the output on Reddit is unreal and it is getting noticed, yourself and a couple others find a way to post articles everyday and it is unreal!  but I noticed we are basically having 10-15 people circle jerking each other  about the same post with similar comments over and over. Someone said above about opening up the conversation inviting people in and the approach in my eyes feels like it could be very insular (not sure if that is the right word) where it isn't actually reaching people or getting people in. I see the same one token recently posting everywhere nonstop the same recycled content.   I don't know because I have rose colored glasses on and I just love Kendu but I wonder if people view us in the same way as I view that coin. Like they don't want to read it or do they end up reading it cause we are everywhere??? No idea.  Also market conditions do matter, so maybe these points mean nothing. We are stuck again in a range of holder up and down up and down (market PR baby the real challenge and we just need to keep going) I guess I think more purposeful to invite people in is my addition to this convo (yes very late I know, but here I am doing what I can when I can). Maybe targeting one influencer/big account where we have a clear opening and making sure everyone jumps on that thread so we get 200 across the board as the goal. Hopefully this makes some senseü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è  Just sending it to you too cause I can't stop won't stop and want to share.

author: Expert-Detective-525
body: good point, can you give some examples?

author: phi_curious
body: Thanks for sharing your thoughts. I think our perspectives align quite closely.  You are definitely correct that markets matter and currently not as many people are looking at crypto or investing as much time. On the other hand that also means that this is a good time to build some new strategies and content.  Let me think about how we can condense all of that info into Reddit content :)  Also I‚Äôm gonna send you a DM here with a question.

author: Expert-Detective-525
body: this is also something I have been thinking about because my replies are robotic. Drop some truth bombs, whether its here or in tg DMs   Seriously I would like some improvements : )

author: TheGDC33
body: Good question the good news is we have exceptional redistribution and the major sell pressure (old whales and the whole issue with the CTO and dishonest dev decisions) are over. My promised NFT Chads may be worthless and not functional at this point, but we have a strong stable floor and the community is stronger than ever. That being said, don't take my words as fact. hop in our TG and see the constant grind. Check out X where lots of big KOLs are noticing and shouting us out without some shady KOL supply or any of that nonsense.      Our second IRL event is happening this weekend in Florida
